meanings.definition: Surpassing all others in excellence, achievement, or quality.
meanings.sent1: She received the best award for her outstanding performance.
meanings.sent2: The best cake at the party was the chocolate one.
meanings.sent3: The best student in class always had a smile on her face.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was the best in the entire art exhibition.
meanings.sent5: The best view from the hilltop took her breath away.

meanings.sent1: It is best to start your homework early to avoid rushing.
meanings.sent2: The best time to visit the beach is during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The best way to learn is by making mistakes and trying again.
meanings.sent4: His best option was to take the scenic route to enjoy the view.
meanings.sent5: The best decision she made was to follow her passion for painting.

meanings.sent1: The best part of the movie was the unexpected plot twist.
meanings.sent2: Ice cream is the best treat on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent3: The best joke of the night had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her best memory from the trip was swimming in the crystal-clear water.
meanings.sent5: The best feeling is when you accomplish something you worked hard for.

meanings.definition: In the most excellent manner; most skillfully or effectively.
meanings.sent1: She danced best when she was completely immersed in the music.
meanings.sent2: He performed best under pressure during the competition.
meanings.sent3: The chef cooked the best when he was in a good mood.
meanings.sent4: The team played best when they communicated effectively on the field.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted best when inspired by nature's beauty.
